mapper.sql: t.id, t.order_no, t.user_id, t.pay_price, t.pay_time, t.consign_time, t.receipt_time, t.shipping_name, t.shipping_code, t.status, t.close_time, t.add_time, t.update_time
mapper.delete: delete from goods_order where 1=1 and id=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into goods_order ( order_no, user_id, pay_price, pay_time, consign_time, receipt_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, status, close_time, add_time, update_time ) values( #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{receiptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{shippingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update goods_order set order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_price = #{payPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, consign_time = #{consignTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receipt_time = #{receiptTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, shipping_name = #{shippingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_code = #{shippingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, close_time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
